title: incloudibly
author: incloudibly
content: COIN.HOST - the crypto hosting provider from Switzerland has developed a new VPN product that is a rare find in the world of numerous VPN offerings.What's different?Dedicated IP and Server ResourcesFirst of all, this VPN server is yours, completely and utterly. You share your server's resources with no one. No one can connect to your server, unless your generate a config for them. No one will share IP address with you, it's dedicated to your VPN server and will stay so while the order is active. Get a dedicated VPN and finally forget about endless captchas and suspended accounts.Two Click Config GenerationManage your configurations with a just s few clicks: select protocol, enter the name and click submit. That's it, config is generated and you can download it as a QR code or text file to your device.pfSense FirewallWant to fine tune your server, add custom firewall rules or edit connection port? pfSense can do these any more things with ease. / available with premium plan only /OpenVPN and WireGuardTwo powerhouses of VPN protocols world backed by hundreds of applications available for virtually every platform.Swiss LocationServers are located in Switzerland, which is widely known for laws that protect privacy. Probably, the best location for any privacy-focused service.No logsStrict no logs policy. We do not store any logs other than required by law (your account and payment data). You can download all data associated with your account and/or request account removal whenever you want to.Crypto AcceptedObviously.Dedicated Crypto VPN PricingBasic VPNMax. connections: 3pfSense® Firewall: NoProtocols: OpenVPN, WireGuard®Monthly: 10 CHF ($9.97 | €10.19 | 0.0005 BTC)Order hereStandard VPNMax. connections: 10pfSense® Firewall: NoProtocols: OpenVPN, WireGuard®Monthly: 15 CHF ($14.95 | €15.29 | 0.0008 BTC)Order herePremium VPNMax. connections: unlimitedpfSense® Firewall: YesProtocols: OpenVPN, WireGuard®Monthly: 20 CHF ($19.94 | €20.38 | 0.0010 BTC)Order hereGet 50% off your first month payment! Redeem coupon code: Code:VPN50OFFSupport24/7 - just open the live chat widget on out website.

comments.author: incloudibly
comments.body: Use code Code:CRYPTOVPN to get 50% off first month payment for a private crypto VPN in Switzerland with dedicated IP address. Supported protocols: OpenVPN / WireGuard.Also, here's a guide from our editor on How to setup your very own WireGuard VPN server on a VPS https://coin.host/blog/how-to-set-up-a-private-wireguard-vpn-server-on-a-vps
